ai_business_context: Demo Organization is a demo environment where staff practice triaging, assigning, and closing the loop on facility feedback across a small set of realistic facility locations (restrooms, break areas, offices, lobby, and exterior).
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

comments.body: Thanks for jumping on this—people were slipping a bit near the sink.

issue.description: Men’s restroom sink faucet is dripping steadily; water pooling on counter and floor near the left sink.

reports.body: Left sink faucet won’t fully shut off—constant drip and the counter is soaked.
Still dripping today; there’s a small puddle forming on the floor by the sinks.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Placing a wet floor sign and scheduling maintenance to replace the faucet cartridge.
Maintenance in progress: shut off water briefly and replaced cartridge/washer; tested for leaks.
Resolved. Faucet no longer drips and area dried/mopped.

comments.body: If we can keep a spare toner on hand in the nook, that would help too.

issue.description: Printer in the Print & Copy Nook is leaving streaks/lines on pages; likely needs toner or drum cleaning.

inbox_entries.location_full_path: HQ / Floor 2 / Open Office / Print & Copy Nook

reports.body: Printouts have a vertical black line down the left side. Happens on multiple docs.
Tried reprinting and it’s still streaky. Might be low toner or dirty drum.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Ordered replacement toner and scheduled quick service check for drum/rollers.
In progress: toner replaced; running calibration and cleaning cycle. Monitoring next 24 hours for recurrence.

comments.body: It’s been pretty noticeable during afternoon meetings—thanks for addressing.

issue.description: Conference Room A ceiling lights flicker intermittently; one panel occasionally goes dim then returns.

inbox_entries.location_full_path: HQ / Floor 2 / Conference Rooms / Conference Room A

reports.body: Lights flicker during meetings (especially the panel closest to the door).
Not constant, but it’s distracting on video calls. Seems worse when the room is first turned on.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Suspected loose ballast/driver or failing LED panel. Electrician visit scheduled; please use alternate room if flicker worsens.

comments.body: Appreciate the quick cleanup—smell is gone now.

issue.description: Main Kitchenette has overflowing trash and sticky residue on the counter near the coffee station.

inbox_entries.location_full_path: HQ / Floor 1 / Break Areas / Main Kitchenette

reports.body: Trash is overflowing and there’s spilled coffee/sugar on the counter—ants might show up if it sits.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Notified cleaning team for same-day pickup and wipe-down.
Resolved. Trash removed, counters disinfected, and floor spot-mopped around coffee station.

comments.body: Could we also add a small sign reminding visitors where to check in? Might reduce confusion.

issue.description: Add clearer wayfinding at Main Entrance directing visitors to Reception Desk (people keep walking into the lobby unsure where to go).

reports.body: Visitors keep stopping at the doors and looking around. A sign pointing to reception would help.
Had two deliveries today ask where to check in—maybe add a stand sign by the entrance.

comments.body: The soap dispenser is working now—thank you.

issue.description: Women’s restroom soap dispenser at the middle sink appears empty or clogged; no soap dispenses.

reports.body: Soap dispenser at the middle sink isn’t dispensing anything (pumps but nothing comes out).
Still no soap this morning; had to use the far-right sink dispenser.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Checking for empty cartridge vs. clogged pump.
In progress: replaced soap cartridge and cleared pump blockage; tested multiple pumps.
Resolved. Dispenser refilled and functioning normally.

comments.body: If it keeps happening, maybe the sensor needs replacement?

issue.description: Lobby reception desk monitor power intermittently cuts out; likely loose power cable or failing power strip.

reports.body: Reception monitor went black twice today; wiggling the power cable brought it back.
Happened again—seems like the power strip under the desk is loose or overloaded.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Checked cable seating and reduced load on the strip; monitoring for recurrence.
In progress: replacing power strip and adding cable management to prevent strain on connectors.

issue.description: Loading Dock has debris (broken pallet wood and plastic wrap) creating a trip hazard near the bay door.

reports.body: There’s broken pallet wood and plastic wrap scattered by the loading bay—easy to trip.
Debris still there this morning; please clear before next delivery.

updates.message: Acknowledged. Facilities to clear debris and sweep dock area today.
Resolved. Debris removed, area swept, and a reminder sent to vendors to break down pallets properly.

issue_category_guidance.ai_include_keywords: leak, dripping, faucet, toilet, flush, clogged, drain, sink, water, soap dispenser
issue_category_guidance.description: Water, drains, toilets, sinks, leaks, clogs, and restroom/kitchen plumbing fixtures.

issue_category_guidance.ai_include_keywords: light, flicker, outlet, power, breaker, switch, wiring, panel, sensor
issue_category_guidance.description: Lighting, outlets, power issues, switches, breakers, and other electrical faults.

issue_category_guidance.ai_include_keywords: trash, spill, dirty, odor, sticky, mop, disinfect, debris, dust
issue_category_guidance.description: Janitorial needs: trash removal, spills, odors, debris, and general cleanliness.

issue_category_guidance.ai_include_keywords: printer, copier, HVAC, thermostat, fridge, microwave, dispenser, monitor
issue_category_guidance.description: Non-plumbing/electrical equipment problems (office and breakroom equipment).

issue_category_guidance.ai_include_keywords: add, improve, suggestion, would be nice, consider, signage, wayfinding
issue_category_guidance.description: Requests to improve the space or process (non-urgent enhancements).
Use when unsure; add a short note to internal context about why categorization is unclear.
